fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 5Y CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 5Y CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Removed Tableau comment lines and converted the row-level multiplication into an inline DAX measure. All field references were transformed to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced field 'Date Sign' depends on Tableau parameters; any calculation that references parameters (directly or via dependencies) must be created as a measure.
